attributes.action: Please bring the old snapchat back🙏🏻🙏🏻
attributes.background:
Snapchat has updated itself and people aren’t happy! 
Bringing back the old snapchat would save a life🙏🏻

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
